row.text: Henricum, archiepiscopum Remensem, rogat, „ut civitatem Bellovacensem a sententia interdicti absolvat, donec controversia in eius vel (Bartholomaei) episcopi Bellovacensis iudicio finem debitum sortiatur“. Martene Coll. II. 687, Bouquet Rec. XV. 795, Migne 200 p. 200. — „Carissimus in Christo“.
